alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 357 PM CDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to central Greeley County. However, at this time it is unknown which if any developing storm would produce a landspout. Any landspouts which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... Leoti, Selkirk and Marienthal. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
